Type.BattleDialog: Let’s go easy, now~ Best not to complicate things too much.
Well, things are looking smooth so far.
Alright, alright. Stay calm, and cooool your head.
Boy, this has no right to make me this nervous…
Tremble in the eternal pits of fear. …Khh, felt like throwing a cool one-liner.
Each of us has duties to fulfill in our own positions.
Let’s start out slowly, no point getting nervous.
I’ll do my best, and you’ll do your best to fulfill our own responsibilities.
Alright, let’s do this!
Seems like I can easily dodge your attacks, hmm?
Oww, all my muscles got tense after fighting so rough! My shoulders are aching…
Looks like our jobs are done now, so let’s get back and cop some rest.
Whew… That was real close… It woulda been a real shame if we failed to handle it.
If only our Miss Library Director could recognize all my hard work~ …She didn’t actually hear that, did she?
Well, that was simple… It’s no problem at all for me!
I… got cornered…? …This is totally embarrassing.
Whoops, that caught me off-guard… That was lame, me, too lame…
It’d be too sucky to die without doing much at all…
It can’t be helped. That’s that, and this is this.
City life makes you numb to this kind of stuff.
Don’t panic, you guys. We gotta get used to this.
Welp, can’t expect others to look after your own life.
Poor fella. You fought with all your might.
Shouldn’t get agitated no matter how tense the situation might be.
I’d better not get impatient, and get things done for certain.
Whew, that guy almost turned the tide and got me there. My heart’s still pounding.
Whoa, buddy, remember the principle of “let your heart burn, but keep your head cool”? Look, your friend and I were both just doing our job.
Sorry about your friend, pal. But he was just doing his job, you know… I’m sure you’ll understand as a fellow Fixer, right?
Nice to meet you, and I hope to have a fair fight!
Luck will be on my side, I’m sure of it. I promise to succeed!
Don’t get too nervous, and just do it as we practiced. I’m sure we can win that way!
I’m fully prepared now! This doesn’t scare me anymore.
I’m confident about this work. Alright, here I come!
I’ve got a good feeling that we can make it!
I believe we can surely make this through.
Everyone, trust me and follow my lead!
If I swing it like this and… Whoawhoawhoa, wah…! …Phew… I almost tripped over…
Let’s stay sharp and go for it, shall we?
We won, we really won! I made it. That means I could be of help to everyone, right?
I’ll do my best within my ability!
I can’t say I’m all too happy, but… It’s the victory that counts!
Good work, everyone! We’ve finished the job nicely.
Let’s retrieve the books and go back now!
I thought I could do this much, but I guess I still have a long way to go.
Maybe I was overwhelmed with enthusiasm…?
No, I didn’t want it to end like this…
Don’t blame yourself. I’m sure you did your best.
Don’t panic, everyone! We should keep it together at times like this.
Stay calm, everyone. Why don’t we take a deep breath? One, take iiiiin… And two, let it out.
Am I really doing a good job…?
I’ll fight harder for you, so you can rest easy now.
Whoa, did you see that…? I did it!
I did it! I can do this much with ease.
That was simple. The opponent was way too spotty!
Winning is just gonna be a matter of time!
Yeah, it’s going smooth! It’s too soon to be rejoicing, though.
We’ll simply strive to fulfill our responsibilities.
Hasty actions will bring you more harm than good.
I don’t want to waste any time. Let’s end this quickly.
We must take a step back and make sound judgement in situations such as this.
I’ll take it that you’re prepared to face any outcome, seeing as you’ve chosen to step inside.
If there’s no opportunity to strike, we’ll simply make one.
It will naturally be harder to aim for weak points if you wield your weapon too recklessly.
Taunting is unnecessary in combat.
We must think and act quickly, most importantly.
While we must fight with all our might, it’s not advised to push ourselves beyond that.
The joy of victory does not feel very delightful.
This isn’t particularly delightful, I must say… Good work, nonetheless.
After we’ve retrieved all the books, we’ll review our performance and see what could be improved for our next battle.
Good work, everyone. Adjust your attire before you head back to your quarters.
We’ll quickly clean up the mess and head back.
There is no need to take pity on me.
Please do not panic; I want you to stay focused on the battle.
It’s entirely my fault that I’ve met such a fate.
It was something we should have expected to occur.
You probably sought to die a more meaningful death than this.
Another one has fallen, but we must go on.
We must prioritize concluding this combat first.
I did not want to witness any more death.
I frankly dislike how I am becoming numb to witnessing death.
…I suppose I must accept it.
You should have made more accurate judgements.
I’m not particularly happy to be victorious.
Recklessly charging is not an efficient method of offense.
You know what I need most? …Retreat, and sleep.
Ah~ I hope they go easy on someone as listless as me…
This overbearing pressure and atmosphere of the battlefield… Not a fan of it.
I just wanna nap in the back. …I know I shouldn’t.
Guess I gotta show some effort to win this, at least.
I’m not the biggest fan of this rule where someone has to win.
How did I end up doing things like this…
Sigh… I’m too tired for this. Can I rest for longer if I end this quickly?
It’s still my job and all… So I’m trying, at least.
I’m being serious about this, if you couldn’t tell…
That should be enough, right? I’ll go get some rest now…
Sigh… It’s not too happy to be the winners, but good work anyways.
Oh yeah, the books over there… Let’s just take ‘em and sort them later.
I’m seeing even more things to clean up…
Let’s just push all the books in a corner, and… Think of what to do later.
Ah… Why is the end always so futile and void…
Results aside, guess I can sleep tight now…
…Sorry I couldn’t help much, I guess.
This is starting to get risky. Sigh… I wanna retreat.
Maybe we shouldn’t have strained ourselves too much.
I’m sure this isn’t how they wanted to die, either.
They must’ve fought hard to live. Was probably a lot more desperate than I am.
…I just wanna end this quickly.
…I can call it a day now, yeah?
I’m doing my best to fight here, despite how I seem…
Maybe you could’ve tried not letting your guard down.
They must’ve had their own purposes, and now we squashed their dreams flat.
I don’t really like that I have to keep doing more of this.
If we brace ourselves and react calmly, we can win this.
Even now, I have a lot to improve… Still, I’ll receive the guests sincerely and earnestly.
I’m nervous, but… I’ll do my best…!
Alright, here I come…! I want you to take this fight seriously.
Be prudent, and everything will work out… Maybe…
The other librarians are doing a great job! I gotta get on their level, too…
Okay, I should stay calm and spot the opponent’s weak points, so let’s think…
It’s alright, I can dodge their attacks… I can do this.
With all these people around me, I can muster up courage once again.
I hope nothing bad happens…
Thank goodness we finished the work smoothly.
I’m glad I could make it through this with everyone.
Thanks for staying with me till the end. Good work!
I’ll try to improve further the next time we fight together.
We won…! Thanks for the stellar work, everyone.
I’d be glad to know I helped in this battle at least a little bit.
…I was, nothing but trouble until the end. I’m—I’m just…
My body feels numb, what do I do…
I tried so hard, and yet… Why does it always have to end like this…
I’m starting to be unsure of what to do now.
I couldn’t be helpful to the others…
I should’ve done a better job.
I can’t get the other librarians shaken up, too…
I won’t let your death go in vain…
I had no choice but to do this to fulfill my role.
I’m sorry, you probably didn’t want to die like this…
I’m sure my opponent did their best too.
I hope we can finish this without any losses…
…You did well enough. Please rest in peace now.
We have to get started, so buckle up.
I hope there’s no idiots who sit around like a duck on my team.
Think you can be our match with such sluggish movement?
You can’t make plans forever.
You won’t get anything done if you sit there and keep saying you’re scared!
Don’t be stuffy and stand straight! You can do it.
If the tide is on our side, push forward!
If I fall here, who’s gonna clean up this mess?
Have faith in us! You’re not fighting alone.
We’re not gonna let you through so easily!
It was obvious we’d win. Thought we couldn’t handle this much?
Alright, I know you’re all exhausted, but! Let’s lie down after we’ve arranged the books in order.
Thanks, all. You did a pretty good job this time.
See, actions speak louder than words.
That’s as far as you could go with your laughable skills.
They already… read my moves…
This’ll end up taking a toll on the guys behind me…
…Sorry. I wasn’t too helpful there.
This isn’t time to be discouraged. Get a move on, all of you!
They got one of us… I won’t let you have it your way anymore.
No problem. …I can still fight.
We can’t let everyone die here… We need to think of a way out.
Don’t expect us to stop here… I’ll win this for sure…
Huff… Barely got one. Who’s next?
Okay, we’ll be able to end this smoothly if we keep it up.
That was reckless. Why’d you come to a battlefield if you aren’t a good fighter?
I don’t wanna be a burden.
Got you! Told you not to get cocky.
Everyone ready? Let’s beat those guys to submission.
The most important thing to remember is feeling the opponent’s rhythm and keeping up with it.
I don’t have nearly as much strength as before… I still can’t get used to it.
Only weak-willed punks run before things even begin.
Shouldn’t let your strength get to your head. You’ll leave yourself wide open.
Pluck up. We’re molded by hardships and discipline of the past.
Let’s work together and give it our best shot.
You know this isn’t just a silly game, yeah?
Mind where you point your blade at.
We got this over with smoothly. Good work, everyone.
Performance, experience, and results… Our side completely overwhelmed theirs.
I’m starting to grow accustomed to this new body.
Now that the fight is over… Guess I’ll cop a nap.
Even though we’ve won, keep in mind that we shouldn’t take each other’s sacrifices for granted.
I was a fool… I wasn’t such a feeble ass before.
It’s upsetting… But I’ll have to accept it.
Damn it, I wasn’t hoping to retire this way…
Even if others face an unfortunate fate, I can’t stop here.
Let’s stay calm. We shouldn’t let ourselves falter because of our colleague’s death.
We should save our grief for after everything is over.
You don’t want their sacrifice to be in vain, yeah?
We should avenge them, but not before we’ve tempered our anger. Always keep a cool head.
This body’s a lot weaker than my previous ones, but I got no problem handling it.
Shoulda acted smart if you noticed your skills were lacking.
Thought you could get me with that? Not a chance.
Wayward wrath will only ruin yourself.
Careless and unfocused actions are a leading cause of death.
If only we could all pursue a noble path together~
Let’s try our best and finish this job so that everyone is safe~
Don’t be so down~ I’m sure we can do this well.
It’s not a good idea to overwork yourselves~
We could lose everything if we hesitate.
Adjust your breath, and stay calm, yeah?
I don’t want anyone to die here.
Sometimes, you’ll have to get bold in order to protect something.
If you won’t back down, we have no choice but to stand our ground.
If there’s a meaning to this fight…
See? We can make it through if we try. Good work, everyone~
How about a fragrant cup of coffee for all~?
I’m glad we could finish this~
Thanks for keeping up ‘til the end~
I guess we can take these books now? Let’s head back, then~
I guess this is as far as I can go…
Was this… just too much for me?
Anyone would want to end this kind of fight with haste.
We need to try harder to minimize the damage…
Let’s not make any more meaningless casualties.
Let’s not get fretful. I believe we can still do this.
It’s alright. We’ll fight harder in that librarian’s stead.
That was smooth~ Let’s take our time and get things done.
I could’ve been the one leaving the stage if I was just a little slower.
It’s a huge shame, all that strength and power was wasted on fighting.
It’s sad, but I’d hate for us to suffer damage even more.
I think I’m slowly getting used to this job.
Stay true to your belief, and act for it.
What matters more than strength… is the faith in our victory.
Trust in yourselves. We should base our actions on the premise that we shall manage this without fail.
You may deceive your foes in battle, but remember that you must be true to yourself at all times.
Let us begin, then. You have come to the point of no return.
As long as we are chained to our lives, we ought to live.
All deeds require the same resolve to pull oneself through.
It seemed to have ended, yet it begins once more.
I urge you to gain composure. Opening your eyes comes next.
What meaning could I give to the work I do solely because I cannot find rest.
Overconfidence is the greatest enemy. We must humbly keep our post.
Did you truly believe that there was clear benefit to be reapt from this battle.
Do you not believe that you will have naught but bleak loss in the end?
…It seems the work has been done, so let us organize the books now.
There is no halting now. We have already made the first step.
To accept such outcomes, one must learn to give up certain pursuits…
In the end, this is all a pointless errand.
One could make endless questions as to why this must be taken so far.
Even if it is impossible to move onward in this place, we must move nonetheless.
One does not easily… take all possibilities into consideration.
Relying on brute strength alone to push through is possibly the most imprudent thing you could do.
All of us are simply performing our duties.
May you rest in peace, at the very least.
Boundless pride and ambition will bring about a bitter end…
There cannot be a good reason for me to take your life, no. I am merely in a hurry to end this work.
Let us begin.
Countless stars light the sky again today.
Your willingness to fight by my side is admirable, but try not to overwork yourselves.
If you move in haste, you are bound to miss certain things.
Be calm.
There will be no obstacle you cannot overcome.
Your outlook is what decides many things.
I would not quite feel comfortable to send you to battle while I rest.
Remember that your own health comes first.
Tis an ordeal to overcome, for them and for us.
Excellent.
You have done well.
I would like to return and repose now.
I am curious to see what memories you have yielded.
We should lay those who have fallen into a slumber where they belong.
It must have been too much for you. Well done enduring it thus far.
Even if a burden that cannot be avoided comes your way, you should not collapse.
No one will blame you.
It was still too dangerous for you, I see.
A star can only truly be seen in the darkness…
Did you think you could avoid it?
The closer to death one is, the freer one becomes.
Your breath is fading.
Now, sink into everlasting quietude.
This is nearing the end.
